item.title: Healing problem
item.dc:creator: @dumass dumass
item.description:
@dumass wrote:

Well i decided to make max hits 250 for my players because the good players own the noobs in 1 hit so i am giving the noobs a chance to heal and these probelms occured. First when i got the hits to 250 they would not go down but i fixed that by changing this code

if (NewHP < 136) {
playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = NewHP;
setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, NewHP, playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
		}

I changed the 136 to 251. I figured to go one over because it was one over the normal 135. Now when I try to heal it will only heal my HP to lvl 220. The problem may be because of what i changed above or beacuse when you train your hits it skips from level 136 to 250 and max it only heals me to my real xp level im not sure

Also everytime you log out and back in u have 10 hp out of whatever

Read full topic
